parents.line: Write the names of the parent use cases here.
If this use case has no parents write None here.

actors.line: Write the names of the actors here.

brief_description.line: Write a brief description of your use case here. This description should be no more than a couple of paragraphs.

preconditions.line: If the use case has no preconditions, write None here.

flow_of_events.line: Each step should be time-ordered and declarative.
Note that extension points are NOT numbered.
If you need to show nested steps
+ Indent them by one plus sign for each level of indent like this.
Include other use cases like this :inc:AnotherUseCase.

postconditions.line: If there are no postconditions write None here.

alternative_flows.line: List the names of the alternative flows here, one on each line.
If there are no alternateive flows, write None here.
